I think it works a little better than [Disruptive Student](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Disruptive Student) or [Disruptive Pitmage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Disruptive Pitmage)...no?  
  
Seriously though, [Freed from the Real](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Freed from the Real) or [Pemmin's Aura](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pemmin's Aura) would be great for harassing opponents. ![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) ramp control with dual lands? As long as you have more blue mana than they have free mana, they can't cast spells...
